contextId.information: The prophet spoke to the altar as if it were a person who could hear him. He said this twice for emphasis. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_apostrophe]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
The fire is compared to a thirsty person drinking water. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_personification]])
